artist: Engraver: Reiner Vinkeles; Delineator: Pieter Frederik de la Croix
description: half length portrait; turned right and looking out at viewer; PL arm resting on table; PR hand on hip; hat on table; wearing military uniform with medal around neck
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: de la Croix Delin   Rein Vinkeles Sculp / JOHAN ARNOLD ZOUTMAN / VICE ADMIRAL / VAN HOLLAND EN WEST VRIESLAND | in pencil abelow image: 2-561
title: Johan Arnold Zoutman
